68 
 
Administration of prophylactic antimicrobials should be performed only when indicated. It 
should be administered within 1 hour before incision for all antimicrobials except Vancomycin 
and Fluoroquinolones, for which it should be administered within 2 hours before incision. 
Redosing should be considered to maintain adequate tissue levels on the basis of on agent half-
life. A single dose of a prophylactic antimicrobial is adequate for most surgical procedures. If 
Cefazolin is not available, use Inj Cefuroxime 1.5 g IV instead.
